statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_response;
SELECT team_name, team_contact FROM emergency_response;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_type FROM emergency_response;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response WHERE team_type = 'Medical';
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM emergency_response WHERE team_contact LIKE '%-1234';
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_type FROM emergency_response WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM emergency_response WHERE team_type = 'Firefighters' ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM emergency_response WHERE team_contact LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT DISTINCT team_contact FROM emergency_response ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, team_contact FROM emergency_response WHERE team_type IS NOT NULL AND team_contact <> '1234567890';
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam;
SELECT team_name, lead_doctor FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_name, contact_number FROM SecurityTeam WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SecurityTeam ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM SecurityTeam WHERE contact_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT team_name, contact_number FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_id, team_name, contact_number FROM SecurityTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%Security%';
SELECT team_name, lead_doctor FROM MedicalTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityTeam WHERE team_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT DISTINCT team_name, team_lead FROM SecurityTeam ORDER BY team_lead ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_team;
SELECT team_name, team_leader FROM medical_team;
SELECT team_name, email_address FROM security_team;
SELECT plan_name, description FROM emergency_plan;
SELECT plan_name, assigned_medical_team_id, assigned_security_team_id FROM emergency_plan;
SELECT * FROM medical_team;
SELECT team_name, team_leader, email_address FROM medical_team;
SELECT plan_name, description, team_name FROM emergency_plan JOIN security_team ON emergency_plan.assigned_security_team_id = security_team.team_id;
SELECT team_name, contact_number FROM medical_team WHERE team_leader = 'John Smith';
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, team_name AS security_team_name FROM emergency_plan JOIN security_team ON emergency_plan.assigned_security_team_id = security_team.team_id;
SELECT team_name, contact_number FROM MedicalTeam;
SELECT * FROM SecurityTeam WHERE shift_start_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description, last_updated FROM EmergencyPlan ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_role, contact_number FROM ContactInformation WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT team_id, team_name, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%ER%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM SecurityTeam WHERE shift_start_time < '08:00:00';
SELECT plan_title, plan_description FROM EmergencyPlan WHERE plan_type = 'Medical' AND last_updated < NOW();
SELECT contact_name, contact_number FROM ContactInformation WHERE team_id = 2 ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_name LIKE '%Emergency%' ORDER BY team_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeams;
SELECT team_name, team_type FROM MedicalTeams WHERE team_type = 'Emergency';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM MedicalTeams ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityTeams WHERE team_name LIKE 'Sec%';
SELECT team_id, team_name, contact_phone FROM MedicalTeams WHERE team_type = 'Medical' ORDER BY team_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_type FROM MedicalTeams WHERE team_type = 'Emergency'
SELECT personnel_id, full_name, role, phone_number FROM Personnel WHERE team_id = 3 ORDER BY full_name DESC
SELECT * FROM SecurityTeams WHERE team_name LIKE '%Security%' AND team_type = 'Guard'
SELECT plan_name, plan_type, LENGTH(plan_description) AS description_length FROM EmergencyPlans WHERE LENGTH(plan_description) > 200 ORDER BY description_length DESC
SELECT location_name, address FROM Location WHERE coordinates LIKE '%35.1,%'
